entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using UriFormat.SafeUnescaped replaces %20 with space in query string #100792
  • System.Speech.Recognition such useless thing #100783
  • When running a Kestrel HTTPS server on Windows, unneccessary active directory authentication is attempted when accepting a new connection from a client. #100774
  • Received an unexpected EOF or 0 bytes from the transport stream #100773
  • Runtime build fails for Mono ARM32 Alpine #100772
  • Websocket callback missing for the Ping/Pong Frames RFC6455 [bug] #100771
  • JIT: Investigate what to do about store forwarding stalls due to block copies #100769
    Future
  • Unable to Attach Visual Studio Debugger to Console App in SDK-style .NET Framework Project #100764
  • Matcher.Match(string) regression between 8.0.0 and 9.0.0 Preview 1 #100762
    9.0.0
  • Question: Process.PrivateMemorySize64 - Differences between Debian/Ubuntu vs Alpine based images #100760
  • [API Proposal]: Add the ResourceType and ResourceName properties to the [LoggerMessageAttribute] #100759
  • Application crashes in release mode throwing System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #100758
  • [wasm] Methodical_d2 test failure #100757
    9.0.0
  • The process cannot access the file 'xxxxx.zip' because it is being used by another process #100756
  • [libraries-jitstress] Various regex tests time out under jitstress #100754
  • iOS: "MONO interpreter: NIY encountered in method ReadTestCase_DataFromJson" when deserializing class with 200 fields #100753
  • iOS AllSubsets_Mono queues can take a very long time #100752
  • Test failure: Interop/IJW/CopyConstructorMarshaler/CopyConstructorMarshaler/CopyConstructorMarshaler.cmd #100751

Closed

  • Add missing RID combinations for Gentoo AND/OR hard-set RID for .NET build #100383
  • Trim analysis doesn't understand receiver type for calls to `GetType()` #100786
  • [NativeAOT/win-x86] System.Runtime.Tests crash #100507
  • SYSLIB1100 and SYSLIB1101 are not suppressible in source #100785
  • Unable to rename ICUDT.dat file in Blazor WASM App Hosted(client server) project publish #100638
    9.0.0
  • [Question] Is it possible that .NET 7 framework-dependent application requires specific (the latest) .NET runtime version? #100006
  • Clean up Windows 7 specific logic in Cryptographic features #71075
    Future
  • Does NativeAOT have its own API, with which it gets the names of methods and their addresses for Stacktrace? #100486
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamCertificateContextOcspLinuxTests.FetchOcspResponse_FirstInvalidThenValid test failure #97836
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamCertificateContextOcspLinuxTests.RefreshOcspResponse_BeforeExpiration test failure #97779
    9.0.0
  • RuntimeException with Incorrect Advice #100524
  • EncryptedXml fails to decrypt element encrypted by a X509 certificate referenced by a negative issuer serial #91064
    9.0.0
  • App using cached local storage sometimes after upgrading to .net8 #96644
  • NativeAOT. Disable reflection only for some assemblies. #100770
  • JIT\Stress\ABI\pinvokes_d tests timed out #93297
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_compiler->lvaInSsa(tree->GetLclNum())' during 'Assertion prop' #90377
    9.0.0
  • HttpWebRequest.GetRequestStreamAsync doesn't open the connection to the server - we always buffer the content #18632
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests.WebWorkerTest.WaitAssertsOnSyncCallback #99951
    9.0.0
  • SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated calls are expensive on Windows #95687
    Future
  • [NAOT][Apple][mobile] Undefined symbols for architecture x86_64: do_vxsort_avx2 causing AppleAppBuilderTask to fail #100632
    9.0.0
  • Custom Build Task Execution Order with NativeAOT Compilation #100646

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix NULL conversion warnings found in Alpine x64 Source-Build #100796
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100795
    area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100794
    area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100793
    area-System.Security
  • Fix comments in ZipFileExtensions.ZipArchiveEntry.Extract.cs #100791
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Remove IDE0060 suppressions #100790
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Removing unnecessary parenthesis. #100789
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Fix PAL test build now that we are using system headers. #100788
    area-PAL-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove invalid `GCPROTECT` for duplicate slot #100787
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix official build by moving the pool provider import to the global variable section #100784
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make InstallRuntimeComponentToFinalDestination use NativeOutputPath for copying to runtime output #100782
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix mono build on alpine arm #100781
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix mismatched buffer element type #100779
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] fix thread creation race with finalizer #100778
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add support for bounds check no throw assertions in range check #100777
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't try building Mono in default subsets on known-broken config #100776
    area-Build-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add missing GC wbarriers for static field stores with hotreload enabled #100775
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [browser] with emscripten ASSERTIONS #100767
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix NullReferenceException in FileSystemWatcher on Windows during dispose #100766
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Generate custom attributes from metadata instead of type system #100763
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Do not merge: Remove hardcoded list of compiler versions in init-comp… #100761
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Update android-bionic.md for latest NDK LTS #100755
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix native leak in CryptoNative_GetX509nameInfo #100780
    area-System.Security
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Fix funclet unwinding #100732
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix bug in virtual annotation logic for RequiresUnreferencedCode #100707
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix SslStreamCertificateContext OCSP test failures #100644
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Switch to iSimdVector and Align WidenAsciiToUtf16 #99982
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Add feature switch to disable COM type descriptors #100693
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix KeyInfoX509Data encoding negative serial numbers #100713
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Use new ABI representation for x86 varargs handling #100746
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Split the HttpConnectionPool into multiple files #100614
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • Avoid frequent calls to CertificateValidationPal.IsLocalCertificateUsed #100513
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add missing property to include native libraries for Apple mobile native linker #100689
    area-Infrastructure, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix assertion for auipc and lui #100578
    community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Exclude unhandledTester test on native AOT #100574
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Remove _ASSERTE(!m_pMethodBeingCompiled->IsDynamicMethod()); #100797
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to latest #100595
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Migrate various GHashTables to dn_simdhash #100497
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Add type-specialized vectorized hash table container #100386
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add PDB support for PersistedAssemblyBuilder #100706
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Add GT_SWIFT_ERROR_RET to represent loading error register upon return #100692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NO MERGE][cdac] cdac-build-tool #100650
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Test Only] Ignore, just to run some tests. #99339
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Rewrite register parameter homing #100572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Preserve all InternalsVisibleTo attributes in ILLink Trimmer #98910
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: initial profile repair #100456
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify jitconfigvalues.h #100704
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Added SIMD path for Vector3, Quaternion and Matrix4x4 operations #99547
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Special casing `System.Guid` for COM VARIANT marshalling #100734
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Introduce a `BuildAllTestsAsStandalone` environment variable to support some local dev scenarios. #100709
    test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add FreeBSD-specific logic to pal::get_default_installation_dir_for_arch #100731
    os-freebsd, area-Host, community-contribution
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-ios, community-contribution
  • STJ: Dispose enumerator on exception #100194
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Implement RuntimeHelpers.SizeOf #100618
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasi] Select mono components #100407
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] improve abort on web worker #100610
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix Path.ChangeExtension behavior with empty extension (#100687) #100691
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • [browser] fix emscripten out/err overrides #100630
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add timeout for dpkg frontend lock #100653
    area-Infrastructure
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement ConditionalSelect API #100718
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Fix constrained call dereferences happening too early #86638
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove various single-scenario YAML parameters in our build scripts and shift implementation responsibility to those scenarios #100115
    area-Infrastructure
  • Replace unaligned casts in SpanHelpers.Memmove #98812
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • fix building error for `error: fallthrough annotation in unreachable code` #100742
    NO-MERGE, area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • VM: Include generic instantiations in stack frames #96440
    area-System.Diagnostics, community-contribution
  • [Ignore] Testing purposes #100708
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use multi-reg load/store for DecodeFromUTF8 #100589
    arch-arm64, area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Microsoft.NET.Sdk.WebAssembly.Pack as library pack #100672
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #100669
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Avoid loading ICU data early during mono startup #100587
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Minor fixes #100661
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add Sve.Abs() and Sve.Add() #100134
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Align up structs to IntPtr.Size if they have gc pointers #100289
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Http2 deadlock #100086
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, tenet-reliability, 8.0.x
  • Arm64/Sve: Predicated Abs, Predicated/UnPredicated Add, Conditional Select #100743
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix the LargestVectorSize parameter for SVE test cases #100606
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [mono] Make mono_inst_name less misleading #91042
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [WIP][mono] Enable runtime tests in AOT modes on linux-arm64 #100685
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Support SSLKEYLOGFILE in Release builds #100665
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] WiP: Simplify flags for passing struct in registers #100080
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] firefox testing #100697
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Change all Cookie localized DateTime logic with Universal alternative #100489
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • [mt] Add signalR WBT on WASM browser app #100723
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • [browser] chrome crash testing #100702
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use macros to form the ARM64 instruction format search table #100403
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Experiments with runtime-extra-platforms pipeline #100389
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios
  • make Socket useable after cancellation #99181
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishTrimmed build time regression. #40060

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #40048
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #39995
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #39996
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • [IP] add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • [Issue #37237 #19650] Dotnet Cli Feature: `dotnet tool update --all` Updating all tools with one command #38996
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Use System.Text.Json in Netfx build of MSBuildSdkResolver #39573
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Let runtime supply the portable RID graph #36807
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2425464 #40043
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set dotnet-watch timeout based on XUnitWorkItemTimeout #40028
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add `--arch` and `--os` options to commands that already support `--runtime` option #37429
    untriaged, Area-CLI

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Despite what a comment in `GetAnonymousTypeFieldType` says, query expressions do not report any errors for ref/restricted types used as members of anonymous types #72945
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Workspaces.MSBuild nuget package is missing reference to Microsoft.Extensions.Logging #72938
  • Visual Studio Refactoring: Seamless Method Relocation #72936
  • Visual Studio back button goes to top of file rather than previous location #72934
  • Unexpected control flow graph verification failure for a erroneous nested collection initializer #72931

Closed

  • False positive IDE0004 and false negative CS0121 reported by the analyzer when calling certain kind of method overloads #72933
  • [dotnet-sdk-9.0.100-preview.3.24175.24] Microsoft.CSharp.Core.targets thrown errors when using "dotnet build" #72753
    17.10

PullRequests

Created

  • Move to a callback-style approach to deserializing objects (part2) #72944
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Switch to an async batchign work queue for processing diagnostics #72942
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge 'main' into RefStructInterfaces #72940
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Avoid asserting unvisited nested binary operators #72935
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Sync less project attributes. #72930
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Move to a callback-style approach to deserializing objects #72943
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update VS telemetry for devkit #72894
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Use generics in syncing code. #72929
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove build-only diagnostics functionality no longer used in product #72941
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Switch to a batching work queue for saving sourcetexts #72926
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove serialization lock in checksum synchronization. #72928
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add a test demonstrating expected behavior #72939
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify token creation. #72915
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Revert unintended compiler change #72932
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify description builder #72917
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused method #72927
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Support ref struct implementing interfaces in `foreach` and `using` statements #72810
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces

Updated

  • Edit and continue diagnostic source #72787
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Allow language specific handlers to use their own types for serialization #72230
  • Invocations statically bound in presence of dynamic arguments should have `dynamic` result if their dynamic binding succeeded in C# 12 #72885
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for checksum-based interceptors #72814
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Consider `params` and default values when comparing signatures #71380
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, New Language Feature - Default lambda parameters
  • Fix a couple of issues with extension lookup/binding #72848
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Allow ref-like locals in iterators and async methods #72664
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref/Unsafe in Iterators/Async, 17.11

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor server side app running under IIS #55019
  • Consider binding to `IUtf8SpanParsable<T>`/`ISpanParsable<T>` over `IParsable<T>` if a type implements it #55016
  • Directly referencing the staticwebassets of QuickGrid results in compilation error #55009
  • Issue when trying to handle batch request in minimal api. #55008

Closed

  • [Blazor WebApp] CustomAuthorizationHandler IAccessTokenProvider not injected #53066
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: json #55007
  • Show Connection Status users in blaozr .net 8 with signalR #54919
  • [SignalR Typescript client library] WebSocket: Emit 'Upgrade-to-WebSocket' HTTP response event all the way to HubConnection #55005
  • Blazor Server 8 Advanced Navigation Font Awesome icons oversized #54990
  • CookiePolicyMiddleware modifies CookieOptions, leading to bugs if it's reused #53875
  • How to inject multiple Background services in Net8? #54972
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #55002

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for generating OpenAPI responses #55020
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.4.24207.7 #55011
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • update project templates use primary constructors #55006
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering

Merged

  • Add APIs for OpenAPI document transformers #54935
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Improve documentation for CookiePolicyMiddleware and CookieOptions #54968
    community-contribution, area-middleware, 9.0-preview4

Updated

  • Include a warning about port spoofing in xml #54971
    community-contribution, area-networking, area-routing
  • Make the key ring cache expire shortly after an immediately-activated key is generated #54517
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor/Web.JS] Add Circuit Handler Notification on Circuit Disconnect #54973
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Add custom message to NavigationException #54862
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Issues

    9.0.0

Merged

  • Update EOL versions #4561

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] NullReferenceException from FlexLayout.InitItemProperties #21711
  • CollectionView.Scrolled event offset isn't correctly reset when items change on Android #21708
  • Hybrid (MAUI Blazor) app crashes on iOS 17.4 #21707
  • [Windows Only]ImageButton get stuck in "PointerOver" state if right click #21706
  • [WinUI] `LineHeight` behavior is different from HTML&CSS behavior #21705
  • After selecting an item in the picker, the 'Unfocused' event does not trigger. #21704
  • Maui Shell navigation combined with Modal and Modeless #21702
  • Android TalkBack screen reader always reads CollectionView elements as clickable #21700
  • @ontouchstart:stopPropagation | @ontouchstart:preventDefault in iOS is not working. #21699
  • Moving items in grouped CollectionView is moving the wrong items #21698
  • [Android] Tap through grid #21695
  • [MAUI] AppThemeBinding as StaticResource fails #21693

Closed

  • When I try to set text from code the textColor do not applied for Entry on iOS #19424
    Backlog
  • Entry doesn't use the TextColor property when the Text value is bound after some seconds (iOS) #19509
    Backlog
  • [iOS] [MacCatalyst] Entry Text color not updated initially when updating text from code behind in .NET MAUI #19470
    Backlog
  • Picker not working on macOS #21691
  • Hot Reload not working for FlexLayout. Forced layout updates not pushed to Android. #20375
  • Error publishing Net MAUI App VS Windows paired with Mac #21701
  • JUCE FRAMEWORK SUPPORT FOR AUDIO APP DEVELOPMENT #21694
  • SelectionChangedCommand from CollectionView doesn't work #8792
  • Running all tests in Controls.DeviceTests on Windows fails with access violation #14742
    Backlog
  • Application display version not updating on iOS Local Device #20000
  • .NET MAUI Button stays gray after enabling on start on Android Emulator in Release configuration #12072
    Backlog
  • Sign In with Apple Web Authenticator for Mac Catalyst #9021
    Backlog
  • [Android] AutomationId still does not work #8277
    Backlog
  • .net maui crashes in the MauiAppCompatActivity/OnCreate method #10218
    Backlog
  • debug and release show different NavBar colors #10315
    Backlog
  • Android - Spashscreen image not scaled correctly #21245
  • InvalidOperationException when using same callback scheme for WebAuthenticatorCallbackActivity and MainActivity #21293
  • Memory issue #21413
  • Memory Leak on Page Navigation while removing the page. #21403
  • Icon missing when switching to another app in iOS #21475
  • Image with AspectFill resizes the container it is in #21420
  • Text of Shell MenuItem not visible in ReleaseMode on Android #21155
  • [regression/8.0.3] SkiaBitmapExportContext.SKImage.Encode JPEG compression bug when encoding the image. #18876
  • RestrictionManager not returning any values in MAUI android. #21342
  • Incomplete Element Tree in UI Inspector (Accessibility Insights) for .NET MAUI #21310

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Removing TapGestureRecognizer with at least 2 taps causes Exception - fix #21714
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #21713
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [android] improve FormattedString performance #21712
  • Clarify PlatformImage supported image formats docs #21697
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, t/docs 📝

Merged

  • Fixed entry text color [iOS] #20100
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-entry
  • Add Helpers to aide Debugging MSBuild tasks #20695
  • [net9.0] Merge net9.0 to main #21666

Updated

  • [ci] Move to arcade , remove GitInfo #21487
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Allow PathFigureCollection to string conversion via converter #19889
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨
  • fix issue in orientation of images #21458
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-image
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • More IndexOf() optimization #20083
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add Apple Privacy Manifest to new project template #21350
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/templates 📄
  • Setup scaffolding for legacy test runner #21423
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event (Reopened) #21156
    area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • [Catalyst] Add default FilePickerFileTypes #21689
  • [Catalyst,Windows] Allow drag item from outside the app #21684
  • Update NavigatedFromEventArgs.cs #21658
    community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input
  • [Trimming] Use new feature switch definition attribute and enable analyzers in Controls.Core.csproj #21621
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers #21505
  • [Android] Support for images inside HTML label #21679
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • A complex property(own type) is not included in the group by #33491

Closed

  • When performing a Natural Language Search on MYSQL and limiting the number of rows returned, Entity Framework produces a warning #33479
  • Cache the full list some properties are populated from in the complex properties of an object #33459
  • Debug output that indexer properties are created in shadow state is incorrect #33484
    9.0.0-preview4
  • DbSet AddRange is not inserting the whole range of entries, if an exception is thrown in at least one of them. Is this expected? #33490
  • "Library e_sqlite3 not found" on .Net Framework 4.7.2 (SDK-style project) #33472
  • Invalid SQL is produced from LINQ Query with Convert.ToString() in join condition #33481

PullRequests

Merged

  • Debug messages intended for shadow properties should not be logged for indexer properties #33488

Updated

  • Implement precompiled queries #33297
  • Introduce liftable constants to shaper to prepare for precompilation #33351

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-08
entry.content:

Created
